headline: Cessna Citation X and X+ Customers Benefit From Starlink High-Speed Internet Availability
summary: WICHITA, Kan., March 13, 2025--Textron Aviation announced an additional high-speed internet connectivity solution for the Cessna Citation X and X+.

headline: Two Bell 429s to Join Entergy's Fleet for Powerline Patrol
summary: Dallas, Texas - Bell Textron Inc., a Textron Inc. company, announced today at VAI Verticon 2025 the signed purchase agreement for two Bell 429s to Entergy Services, LLC, an integrated energy company...
